Description: The certification edition to which the listing belongs

The unique CHPL ID of the listing. The CHPL ID format, Edition.ATL.ACB.Developer.Product.Version.ICS.AdditionalSoftware.Date, is coded using product-specific information. Edition = certification edition (ex. 2014, 2015); ATL = two digit code for the ONC Authorized Testing Laboratory (ATL); ACB = two digit code for the ONC Authorized Certifying Body (ACB); Developer = four digit code for the health IT product developer; Product = four character alphanumeric reference to the certified product; Version = two character alphanumeric reference to the version of the certified product; ICS = binary code indicating Inherited Certified Status (incremental); AdditionalSoftware = binary code indicating the requirement for additional software to meeting certification requirements (1 = yes; 0 = no); Date = Date of certification (format = YYMMDD)
The unique database ID of the listing
The ID used by ONC-ACBs for internal tracking
The date on which the listing was certified

Allowed Values: Active; Suspended by ONC; Suspended by ONC-ACB; Withdrawn by Developer; Withdrawn by Developer Under Surveillance/Review; Withdrawn by ONC-ACB; Terminated by ONC; Retired
Description: The certification status for the corresponding listing. For a detailed description of each certification status, please see 'Understanding Certification Status in the CHPL', available in the CHPL Public User Guide

Allowed Values: Drummond Group Inc.;UL LLC;ICSA Labs; SLI Compliance
Description: The ONC-ACB responsible for certifying the listing
The name of the developer or vendor of the certified health IT product
The unique database ID of the developer
URL indicating the location of the SVAP notice for this listing; required if SVAP Notice Last Update is present
Date the SVAP Notice URL was last updated; required if SVAP Notice URL is present
Any criterion that has at least one SVAP Value
Regulatory text citation for the selected SVAP value
Date the SVAP was added to the criterion
"New" indicates the SVAP was added at the same time as the criterion; "Updated" indicates the SVAP was added to an existing criterion
Indicates whether this is a current SVAP value or if it has been replaced by another SVAP for this criterion
